product_name: Salomon S-Lab Advanced Skin Hydro 12 Set Hydration Pack
long_description: A lightweight pack for long-distance trail running, the formfitting Salomon S-Lab Advanced Skin Hydro 12 Set Hydration Pack includes 16 oz. hydration flasks and plenty of pockets for energy food. Enjoy all-day comfort with soft, stretchy fabric and load lifters at the shoulders; open 3D mesh and elastic jersey fabric at the lower back help keep you cool and dry. The front features 2 energy pockets, 2 secure mesh pockets and 2 hydro pockets with two 16 oz. soft flasks with Blaster valves; flasks are free of BPA, phthalates, and PVC. The back has 2 zippered pockets along the sides and a compartment that you can access with either hand. Specially designed pole holder offers a secure, jostle-free spot to store trekking poles when not in use. The Salomon S-Lab Advanced Skin Hydro 12 Set Hydration Pack includes an emergency blanket, whistle and reflective accents.
short_description: A lightweight pack for long-distance trail running, the formfitting Salomon S-Lab Advanced Skin Hydro 12 Set Hydration Pack includes 16 oz. hydration flasks and plenty of pockets for energy food.
